name: Bitterroot Ale
description: A rough brew with sharp bitterness and little refinement.

name: Deep Forest IPA
description: A strong ale with pine and nettle notes, favored by woodsmen.

name: Imperial Hopstorm
description: A premium IPA with overwhelming flavor and strong finish.

name: Mulberry Juice
description: A sweet and slightly tangy juice, common among peasants.

name: Crisp Orchard Cider
description: Balanced apple cider, slightly effervescent and smooth.

name: Elven Berrywine
description: Delicate berrywine, aged and enchanted by elven vintners.

name: Gutburner Gin
description: Hard-hitting and poorly distilled. Popular with mercenaries.

name: Dwarven Emberbrew
description: A powerful spirit aged in volcanic stone casks.

name: Godsbane Whiskey
description: A legendary dark spirit said to silence bards and kings alike.

name: Corktown Red
description: A bland red wine with minimal sweetness or scent.

name: Suncliff White
description: Clean and dry white wine with a hint of citrus.

name: Silvervine Reserve
description: A noble wine prized for its clarity and crispness.

name: Breadmilk
description: A watery blend of milk and malt, usually served lukewarm.

name: Velvet Stout
description: A dark ale with a creamy finish and hints of caramel.

name: Creamshade Liqueur
description: A decadent dessert drink with hints of vanilla and almond.

name: Greenmead
description: A strange sour mead brewed with wild apples.

name: Bitter Lemon Ale
description: Tart and bitter with an herbal punch.

name: Stormcatcher Lambic
description: A rare and expensive fermented fruit beer with a wild tang.

name: Honeyed Mead
description: A simple mead with light honey sweetness.

name: Ambrosial Elixir
description: A rich and decadent sweet spirit with floral notes.

name: Spiced Tavern Ale
description: A budget ale infused with mild cinnamon and clove.

name: Cinnamon Spice Lager
description: Lager with warming cinnamon and nutmeg.

name: Imperial Spiced Brew
description: Full-bodied ale with robust spice blend.

name: Wildflower Tisane
description: Light herbal tea from local blooms.

name: Enchanted Herb Tonic
description: Potent herbal infusion praised for its clarity.

name: Cream Ale
description: Light, smooth ale with a creamy finish.

description: Velvety stout with rich creamy body.
